entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
